Author: lbvl
Text: Aaaw thanks so much, these words do really help and make me feel better. Thank you for the effort to write them out! And besides, advice isn‚Äôt always the best thing indeed (at least not for me personally). A listening ear and empathy means the most! üòò

Author: sjsmiles
Text: There are some beautiful people on this sub who give fantastic advice and have a gift for putting everything in perspective...that is not my strength unfortunately!  But I do empathize with you. I wrote out and deleted a bunch of advice bc what do I know?? Everybody has their own struggle and I can't presume to know what will help you. But I didn't want to scroll past without a word. ‚ù§
